formalpara.title: Figure 2. Schematic representation of the mitochondrial respiratory chain
formalpara.para: The twelve mtDNA-encoded subunits in C. elegans are shown in red and nuclear DNA (nDNA)-encoded subunits in green. The table indicates the estimated numbers of subunits that comprise the nematode complexes. IMM, inner mitochondrial membrane; IMS, intermembrane space; Q, ubiquinone; Cyt c, cytochrome c.
